nta:
//events //movements broadcast chan police_a2p, police_p2a, police_g2h, police_h2g, police_c2n, police_n2c, police_a2b, police_b2a, police_p2o, police_o2p, police_b2c, police_c2b, police_o2n, police_n2o, police_c2d, police_d2c, police_n2m, police_m2n, police_d2e, police_e2d, police_m2i, police_i2m, police_d2f, police_f2d, police_m2l, police_l2m, police_f2g, police_g2f, police_l2h, police_h2l, police_e2g, police_g2e, police_i2h, police_h2i, thief_a2p, thief_p2a, thief_g2h, thief_h2g, thief_c2n, thief_n2c, thief_a2b, thief_b2a, thief_p2o, thief_o2p, thief_b2c, thief_c2b, thief_o2n, thief_n2o, thief_c2d, thief_d2c, thief_n2m, thief_m2n, thief_d2e, thief_e2d, thief_m2i, thief_i2m, thief_d2f, thief_f2d, thief_m2l, thief_l2m, thief_f2g, thief_g2f, thief_l2h, thief_h2l, thief_e2g, thief_g2e, thief_i2h, thief_h2i ; //actions broadcast chan catch;
//assuzione che initial state per ogni rule è sempre a index zero quandi si crea, dovrebbe essere coso //nota concettuale importante: mentre per le posizioni uso come sono ordinate nella definizione, erl e regole uso come le ordino io nel crearle //Agents //nota: rule and agents can't have the same name clock Cpolice, Cthief; //tutte le volta che si prendono gli indici delle location, si shiftano di uno, così no c'è la location zero, e quindi non c'è nemmeno lo stato -0 che manda tutto in merda int Ppolice=1, Pthief=8; //Objective
clock Creach;
automata_declaration
rules agents
police
//no local declarations used
//LOCATIONS //nota: sto dando stesso ID a location su agneti diversi, spero non lo mandi a male //se lo user non definisce connesssioni tra tutte le location lui non smatta
a
b
c
d
e
f
g
h
i
l
m
n
o
p
//transitional locations
going_a_to_p Cpolice<=12
going_p_to_a Cpolice<=12
going_g_to_h Cpolice<=12
going_h_to_g Cpolice<=12
going_c_to_n Cpolice<=17
going_n_to_c Cpolice<=17
going_a_to_b Cpolice<=11
going_b_to_a Cpolice<=11
going_p_to_o Cpolice<=11
going_o_to_p Cpolice<=11
going_b_to_c Cpolice<=5
going_c_to_b Cpolice<=5
going_o_to_n Cpolice<=5

going_d_to_e Cpolice<=5

going_m_to_i Cpolice<=5
going_i_to_m Cpolice<=5
going_d_to_f Cpolice<=10
going_f_to_d Cpolice<=10
going_m_to_l Cpolice<=10
going_l_to_m Cpolice<=10
going_f_to_g Cpolice<=5
going_g_to_f Cpolice<=5
going_l_to_h Cpolice<=5
going_h_to_l Cpolice<=5
going_e_to_g Cpolice<=10
going_g_to_e Cpolice<=10
going_i_to_h Cpolice<=10
going_h_to_i Cpolice<=10
//location for durable actions (just one if it's locations specic and/or the agent isn't mobile )
//initial location id is passed
//transitions //movement transitions
police_a2p! Cpolice > 1 Ppolice = -114, Cpolice= 0
Cpolice > 11 Ppolice = 14, Cpolice= 0
police_p2a! Cpolice > 1 Ppolice = -141, Cpolice= 0
Cpolice>11 Ppolice = 1, Cpolice= 0

police_h2i! Cpolice > 1 Ppolice = -89, Cpolice= 0
Cpolice>9 Ppolice = 9, Cpolice= 0
//action transitions //BUG : if an action si collaborative but nobody can react to it, the action will be always allowed
catch! Cpolice =0 Cpolice > 1 && (Pthief==1)
catch! Cpolice =0 Cpolice > 1 && (Pthief==2)
catch! Cpolice =0 Cpolice > 1 && (Pthief==3)
catch! Cpolice =0 Cpolice > 1 && (Pthief==4)

thief
//no local declarations used
//LOCATIONS //nota: sto dando stesso ID a location su agneti diversi, spero non lo mandi a male //se lo user non definisce connesssioni tra tutte le location lui non smatta
